newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Guangzhou Investment unit sets FRN.
newsitem.headline: Guangzhou Investment unit sets FRN.

text.p: The following issue was announced by arranger AB Capital Markets (HK).
BORROWER GUANGZHOU INVESTMENT FINANCE CAYMAN ISLANDS
GUARANTOR GUANGZHOU INVESTMENT CO LTD
AMT SFR60 MLN COUPON 6M SFRL+125 MATURITY 2 YRS
OR US$50 MLN* OR 6M US$L+175
TYPE FRN ISS PRICE PAR LAUNCHED WK SEP 2
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE REPLIES 06.SEP.96
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS SFR100K
RATINGS NONE SALE LMTS CUSTOMARY PAY DATE 18.SEP.96
NEG PLG YES CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY HONG KONG**TAX PROV STANDARD
NOTES *AT LENDERS' OPTION
**BORROWER IS AN SPV OF THE GUARANTOR. GUANGZHOU
INVESTMENT CO IS A PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT AND INVESTMENT
COMPANY 52 PCT OWNED BY YUE XIU, AN INVESTMENT HOLDING
COMPANY WHOLLY OWNED BY THE GUANGZHOU MUNICIPAL GOVT.
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
SENIOR MANAGERS SFR6 MLN 170 BP ALL-IN 210
CO-MANAGERS UP TO SFR4 MLN 135 BP ALL-IN 192.5
OR SENOR MANAGERS US$5 MLN 65 BP ALL-IN 207.5
CO-MANAGERS US$3 MLN 30 BP ALL-IN 190
ARRANGER AB CAPITAL MARKETS (HK), UBS HONG KONG
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843-6371
